response.original_title: Born to Never Throw Anything Away
response.overview: "Before my uncle AJ moved out of his house in Rutland VTI wanted to document it.  He had some amazing stuff! Maybe a little bit disorganized. This piece was part of an installation that i did at the deCordova Museum in Massachusetts.  It was shot on 16mm film.  The soundtrack was an adventure where i laid down a drum machine track and then asked two musicians to lay down tracks on top of it. The 1st part is by Amil Byleckie, the 2nd part is by Natalja Kent." -Xander
response.title: Born to Never Throw Anything Away
